text: Ñɨn anɨb ak, Epikuliyan bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap, Stowik bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap,17.18 Man anɨb okok, binɨb gos adek keke nɨgɨlak okok, yɨb keke agɨl, ogɨnap Epikuliyan binɨb agɨlak, ogɨnap Stowik binɨb agɨlak.  kɨli Pol ayɨp takaw ag amɨl apɨl gɨlak. Anɨgel, Pol ne Jisas kumɨl tɨkjakak takaw teplep ak agek, kɨli nɨŋɨd ogɨnap agɨlak, Bɨ takaw monmon agup awl, takaw anɨb ak tay agup agɨlak? Pen ogɨnap agɨlak, Binɨb pal okok kɨli tap anɨb okok agnɨgelɨgɨpal takaw ak agup agɨlak.
